pageContext.claim: “They wrote up a fake dossier that has proven to be totally fake -- written by Christopher Steele, paid for by Hillary Clinton and the Democrats -- and they used that illegally in the FISA courts.”
pageContext.analysis: The dossier commissioned by Fusion GPS for Democrats contained salacious elements and many details turned out to be incorrect or unproven. Fusion has said the former British spy who wrote it received $168,000. The FBI was sufficiently impressed that it considered pay him for additional research. The Fact Checker compared {the Steele memos} with the findings of the Mueller report and found several areas of overlap as well as major sections that remain unconfirmed and in doubt.
